channel.title: Stable Source Code
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
I used to play runescape fairly religiously a few years back, but over time became annoyed with all of the changes that were made and ended up quitting. I never thought about using a private server to play the game I very muched loved. However, I was disappointed to find the state that most of these servers were in. I understand that this is a hobby for most people so I won't be too critical :)
I am a software engineer by trade for a large apparel manufacturer. I have been programming in Java for the last seven years or so and am very familiar with software development. Mainly, I do server development (Spring, Hibernate, WebServices) but I also do a bit of client development (Jquery/GWT) and some game programming in my free time.
I am here to ask the group for your opinion on what would be the best base for me to start with? I have been working my way through some of the downloads but I thought I would get more luck asking for opinions. Mainly I am looking for a stable easy to run version. Doesn't have to be complete what so ever (almost better if it is slim).
I am hopeful my skillset will help the community develop a much more stable/extensible private server codebase!
Thanks! G

item.title: Stable Source Code
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:13, topic:545553”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=664436.msg4442011#msg4442011 date=1406998258]

ScapeEmulator is better then Apollo

Once you learn to use then and than properly maybe someone will take you seriously.

I already know how to use it properly. I’m using it for my 550. What makes you think Apollo is better?
[/quote]
When you learn to use THE WORDS “THEN” and “THAN”, not your shitty server[/quote]
This guy doesn’t even speak english as his first language and can understand what I wrote.

10/10 RandQm

Read full topic

item.title: Stable Source Code
item.dc:creator: @cozmokramer8 cozmokramer8
item.description:
@cozmokramer8 wrote:

Thanks for the feedback everyone. I like that Apollo has a Github account too and just does host a sketchy .rar on media fire

As for the skype account, I don’t use it but I can PM you my gchat handle if you wanna talk.

Thanks!

Read full topic
